### Data preparation
```{r}
# draw 2 random samples of 2000 participants
load("./recovery.Rdata")
set.seed(2631) 
dat1 <- dat[sample(1:10000, 2000),] %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  na.omit() %>%
  dplyr::select(-id) 
set.seed(2855) 
dat2 <- dat[sample(1:10000, 2000),] %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  na.omit() %>%
  dplyr::select(-id) 
```
